$Quick Change Badge is Free to Equip [Nabrix]
003138E4 00000000
*The BP cost for the Quick Change Badge is reduced from 7 to 0.

$Enemy HP 1.5x [Jdaster64]
C21290CC 00000012
9421FFD0 7C0802A6
90010034 BF410008
83E30000 2C1F00AB
41A1005C 83E30010
57FF07FE 2C1F0001
4182004C A3E30008
3BC00096 2C1E0000
40A1001C 2C1E1388
41810014 7FFFF1D6
3BFF0032 3BC00064
7FFFF3D6 2C1F0001
40A00008 3BE00001
B3E30008 B3E3000A
83E30010 63FF0001
93E30010 BB410008
80010034 7C0803A6
8803000E 38210030
60000000 00000000
*xxxx = multiplier, in percentage (in hex); e.g. 00C8 = 200%
*zzzz = 90CC (NA), 3BE8 (JP), ABB4 (PAL)
*C212zzzz (line 01)
*3BC0xxxx (line 08)

$Enemy DEF +1 [Jdaster64]
4A000000 800FDB28
14000000 7F8400AE
14000004 7F6300AE
1400000C 2C000002
D2000008 0000000D
9421FFD0 9001002C
7C0802A6 90010034
BF410008 7F9F0774
83D50004 2C1E00AB
41A10028 2C1F0063
40800020 3BFF0001
2C1F0000 40A00008
3BE00000 2C1F0063
40A10008 3BE00063
7FE0FB78 BB410008
7C1C0378 80010034
7C0803A6 8001002C
38210030 00000000
4A000000 80000000
*xxxx = number to add/subtract (in hex); works properly with flipped enemies, elemental resistance, etc.
*zzzz = DB28 (NA), 8BB0 (JP), E994 (PAL)
*4A000000 800Fzzzz (line 01)
*40800020 3BFFxxxx (line 11)
